quote: The AI Technician course has been an incredible opportunity to learn about industry standard Cloud Native practices that I would have otherwise had no exposure to.
author: CW3 M. Lindholm | Cohort 4 AI Technician

quote: I thoroughly enjoyed taking the AI Tech courses in Machine Learning, DevOps, Cloud Native, and Data Engineering. These experiences helped me build strong, practical skills and a solid technical understanding of modern tools and services.
author: SSG Z. Coleman | Cohort 4 AI Technician

quote: The AI Technician program was meticulously structured and user-friendly. The introductory subjects were accessible to beginners, and I had limited technical knowledge prior to enrolling. Since completing the program, I have gained a strong foundation in various AI-related topics and web applications development. I wholeheartedly recommend this program to any service member seeking to enhance their expertise in the field of artificial intelligence.
author: 1LT K. Lewis | Cohort 4 AI Technician
